1. Google faces controversy over edited Gemini AI demo video  CNBC
  2. Google Gemini AI Tries Outsmarting ChatGPT Using Photos and Videos  CNET
  3. Google is rolling out new AI models for health care. Here's how doctors are using them  CNBC
  4. Google launches Gemini, the AI model it hopes will take down GPT-4  The Verge
  5. Google Unveils AI Model Gemini Pro to Compete With Microsoft in the Cloud  Bloomberg
